# Plot VPC data generated by tidyvpc using custom function

Plot VPC data generated by tidyvpc using custom function

## Usage

``` r
plot_vpc(
  .vpcdata = vpc.predcorr.all,
  .predcorr = FALSE,
  .pointsize = 0.6,
  .subset = list(Study = "XXX-XXX-XXX"),
  .x_axis_lab = "Time after first dose (h)",
  .y_axis_lab =
    "Percentiles and associated 95% CI\nprediction-corrected concentration (ng/mL)"
)
```

## Arguments

- .vpcdata:

  dataset generated by tidyvpc

- .predcorr:

  TRUE/FALSE - whether to use prediction-corrected observations or not

- .pointsize:

  size of points for observations in plot

- .subset:

  subset of data?

- .x_axis_lab:

  x-axis label

- .y_axis_lab:

  y-axis label
